column4: The parameters improve the resolution of the centre of the ellipse and of its axes.

column3: Position of the centre of the hazard
column4: When centre of hazard is different from the centre of the ellipse. It is expressed in degrees of latitude and longitude in offset of the centre of the ellipse, with a limitation of +/- 10 degrees.
Geometry of this second ellipse is computed from the original ellipse (shift, size and rotation).

column3: Quantitative and detailed information related to hazard category and type
column4: Option to provide quantitative or more detailed information related to the hazard category and type.
